pull.title: doc: Clarify that change_cost cannot be negative in GetSelectionWaste
pull.body:
We assert that the `change_cost` must be positive so we should document it in the function's docs

https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/4f5ad43b1e05cd7b403f87aae4c4d42e5aea810b/src/wallet/coinselection.cpp#L361

events.body: Concept ACK: preconditions should be documented

doc: Clarify that change_cost cannot be negative in GetSelectionWaste

events.message: doc: Clarify that change_cost cannot be negative in GetSelectionWaste

events.body:
ACK d2eccacd188959c5aed661d0d5b39c119e7c7a32

This should be documented properly. ðŸ¥ƒ

ACK d2eccacd188959c5aed661d0d5b39c119e7c7a32

It makes sense to document the condition that is later asserted in the code.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -174,7 +174,7 @@ struct OutputGroup
  * change_cost = effective_feerate * change_output_size + long_term_feerate * change_spend_size
  *
  * @param[in] inputs The selected inputs
- * @param[in] change_cost The cost of creating change and spending it in the future. Only used if there is change. Must be 0 if there is no change.
+ * @param[in] change_cost The cost of creating change and spending it in the future. Must be positive if there is change. Must be 0 if there is no change.
comments.body:
maybe keep both the "Only used if" and "must be positive" info
```diff
- * @param[in] change_cost The cost of creating change and spending it in the future. Only used if there is change. Must be 0 if there is no change.
+ * @param[in] change_cost The cost of creating change and spending it in the future.
+ *                        Only used if there is change, in which case it must be positive.
+ *                        Must be 0 if there is no change.
```

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -174,7 +174,7 @@ struct OutputGroup
  * change_cost = effective_feerate * change_output_size + long_term_feerate * change_spend_size
  *
  * @param[in] inputs The selected inputs
- * @param[in] change_cost The cost of creating change and spending it in the future. Only used if there is change. Must be 0 if there is no change.
+ * @param[in] change_cost The cost of creating change and spending it in the future. Must be positive if there is change. Must be 0 if there is no change.
